org.stfm.texdoclet
Class HTMLtoLaTeXBackEnd

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback
      org.stfm.texdoclet.HTMLtoLaTeXBackEnd

public class HTMLtoLaTeXBackEnd
extends HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback

This class implements a ParserCallback that translates HTML to the corresponding LaTeX. Not all tags a processed but the most common are.

HTML links to files located in the doc-files directory (appendix_a.html, appendix_b.txt) are transformed to references to the appendix, whereby the referenced files itself are included in the appendix.

Author:
Soeren Caspersen
See Also:
ParserDelegator
